title: Where to Find Value in Today's Market
description: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and deputy editor Ben Levisohn discuss value-investing opportunities in a pricey market with John Buckingham, a portfolio manager at Kovitz and editor of The Prudent Speculator newsletter.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
